Package src.controller

Class InvoiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.InvoiceManager
  • public class InvoiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    InvoiceManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - InvoiceView and HandleCheckInOutView and the model class - Invoice.

    It can create and print Invoice.

    Since:
    2022-04-07

    • Method Detail

      • createInvoice

        public static Invoice createInvoice​(java.lang.String invoiceId,
                                    java.lang.String guestIdToPay,
                                    java.lang.String roomTypeAsStr,
                                    double roomPrice,
                                    boolean isRoomWifiEnabled,
                                    java.lang.String reservationId,
                                    int nights,
                                    java.lang.String dateOfPayment,
                                    double taxRate,
                                    double discountRate,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Order> orders,
                                    double subTotal,
                                    double total)
        Creates an Invoice.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - Id of the invoice.
        guestIdToPay - Id of the guest who makes payment.
        roomTypeAsStr - The type of the room.
        roomPrice - The price of the room.
        isRoomWifiEnabled - A boolean value which indicates whether the room is Wifi enabled.
        reservationId - Id of the reservation.
        nights - Numbers of nights spent.
        dateOfPayment - The date which the payment is made.
        taxRate - The rate of tax.
        discountRate - The rate of discount.
        orders - Orders of the room.
        subTotal - Total amount without discount rate and tax rate.
        total - Total amount with discount rate and tax rate.
        Returns:
        The created invoice.

      • printInvoice

        public static void printInvoice​(java.lang.String invoiceId)
        Prints out a specified invoice by invoice Id.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - Id of the Invoice.

      • validateInvoiceId

        public static boolean validateInvoiceId​(java.lang.String invoiceId)
        Validates an invoice by invoice Id.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - Id of the invoice.
        Returns:
        true if the invoice Id is valid. Otherwise, false.

      • printInvoiceDetails

        public static void printInvoiceDetails​(Invoice invoice)
        A method that print out the invoice

        See Invoice For the details of the reservation and order.

        Parameters:
        invoice - invoice of the reservation.
